name: Galactic Feud
description:
Welcome to GALACTIC FEUD!

Play with friends locally or online in this fast-paced party brawler. Compete against each other in this fun filled, hilarity ensuing, adrenaline pumping, caffeine consuming, all out slap fest.





Select one of our lovable contestants who have been kidna.... I mean... randomly selected to compete in the greatest game show of all time. Each one comes with their own special ability and unique personality that is just to die for and some of them will! We have packed as much destructive power as we can in these adorable hellions and we leave it to you to unlock their full potential!






Here at Galactic Feud HQ, we know how important it is to keep our shows fresh and new. Each host will have the option to change an insane amount of different game settings, making each experience a new one. Change everything from game modes and maps to gravity and game speed. We have given you the ultimate control; what you do with it is up to you!











"Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together" - J.C.P

Our development team knows that in order to provide the best we have to look to our community for not only help in finding and fixing issues, but also in helping us to make this the best possible game it can be. Early Access gives us the opportunity to expand our community and create a forum for the establishment and growth of ideas.

Current features
  • 12 Exciting Maps
  • 6 Chaotic Game-Modes
  • 15 Eccentric Contestants
  • 7 Unique Weapons
  • Adjustable Host Settings
  • Local or Online Multiplayer!
  • Bot support for when your friends leave
  • Partial controller support (Handles everything except kicking players and inviting/joining through Steam)

In Development
  • More Maniacal Maps
  • Even More Wild Game-Modes
  • More Than More New Unique Contestants
  • Ditto^ except with more weapons
  • Community Driven Ideas


SPECIAL THANKS

We would never have made it to this point with out the help provided by these wonderful people. Thank you so much for testing with us, telling us our ideas are terrible and being all around great people!

[TCI] Pillow - TheLoneK - Chaos4000 - KillerHippie - Wolfieboy21 - Apollyoned - Meximus -JosephSolar - FaceTheSound - Porty - ZhrChaos - The_Cliffy - Stumpt Games - ChaoticHD - Trinax - KIT - AKillerDogV100 - Dardanos_of_fate - MonkeyMan1520 - Wacky - Gornall27 - KriSsS_GonKo - Gear - Nate - PokeHearts - VaguelyRogueGamer





The minimum requirements represent the absolute minimum specifications required to run the game, however they will not result in a perfect experience and you will have minor visual issues.
